org.lwjgl.opencl

Class CLDeviceTopologyAMD

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.PointerWrapper
      • org.lwjgl.system.Struct
        • org.lwjgl.opencl.CLDeviceTopologyAMD
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public class CLDeviceTopologyAMD
extends Struct
    The struct returned by CL10.clGetDeviceInfo(long, int, long, java.nio.ByteBuffer, java.nio.ByteBuffer) with param_name set to AMDDeviceTopology.CL_DEVICE_TOPOLOGY_AMD.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CLDeviceTopologyAMD

        public CLDeviceTopologyAMD(long struct)
        Creates a CLDeviceTopologyAMD instance at the specified memory address.

      • CLDeviceTopologyAMD

        public CLDeviceTopologyAMD(java.nio.ByteBuffer container)
        Creates a CLDeviceTopologyAMD instance at the current position of the specified ByteBuffer container. Changes to the buffer's content will be visible to the struct instance and vice versa.

        The created instance holds a strong reference to the container object.
